titleStmt.title: Answers for the brewars [sic] within the town of Edinburgh and suburbs, and the priviledge of the Shire of Mid-lothian : to the reasons offered to their Majesties High Commissioner, and the right honourable the Estates of Parliament, by the magistrates of Edinburgh, in realtion to an imposition of two pennies upon the pynt of ale, now craved by them for the space of thirty years, upon pretence of payment of the towns debts.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
